synopsis.text: Due to an unfortunate series of events, college freshman Aoi Tokura finds solace in Rainy Color, a quaint and inviting café renowned for its delicious hot cocoa. Aoi quickly becomes a part-time server, working alongside the skilled barista Shion Koga. The café attracts a variety of patrons, including two charismatic college students who catch Aoi's attention. As he becomes increasingly entwined in their lives, Aoi's once mundane existence turns into a lively, entertaining adventure filled with unexpected encounters and heartwarming moments.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
